==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=三辅}}

===Etymology===
[[三]] ([[three]]) + [[輔]] ([[auxiliary]]; to [[assist]]: i.e. to [[assist]] in [[defending]] the [[capital]])
: This term was originally coined to describe three official civil posts. Each of the three civil posts also defined a specific geographic area outside of the capital at [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]]. The three posts were:
:# [[京兆尹]] jīngzhàoyǐn (on the eastern outskirts of [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]])
:# [[左馮翊]] zuǒ píngyì (on the northwestern outskirts of [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]])
:# [[右扶風]] yòu fúfēng (on the western outskirts of [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]])
